meanings.definition: Substances that are toxic to cells.
meanings.sent1: The cytotoxins in the medicine target cancer cells.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the effects of cytotoxins on different types of cells.
meanings.sent3: The cytotoxins in the cleaning solution were so strong, they dissolved the entire cell!
meanings.sent4: The cytotoxins acted like tiny assassins, silently destroying the cells.
meanings.sent5: The cytotoxins were like tiny bombs, exploding within the cells and causing havoc.

meanings.definition: A type of poison that can kill cells.
meanings.sent1: The cytotoxins found in some plants can be deadly to cells.
meanings.sent2: Exposure to cytotoxins can lead to cell death and tissue damage.
meanings.sent3: The villain's evil plan involved using cytotoxins to destroy the hero's cells!
meanings.sent4: The cytotoxins were like invisible killers, silently taking out the cells one by one.
meanings.sent5: The cytotoxins were like deadly arrows, piercing the cells and causing them to wither.

meanings.definition: Chemicals that damage or destroy cells.
meanings.sent1: The cytotoxins released during the chemical spill caused harm to nearby cells.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use cytotoxins in chemotherapy to target and destroy cancer cells.
meanings.sent3: The cytotoxins in the experiment went rogue and started attacking all the cells!
meanings.sent4: The cytotoxins were like wrecking balls, crashing into the cells and breaking them apart.
meanings.sent5: The cytotoxins were like corrosive acids, eating away at the cells and leaving destruction in their wake.
